features: LUXURIOUS AND WATERPROOF - High-quality microfiber leather provides a soft yet durable and waterproof layer of protection for your vehicle's seats.
PREMIUM COMFORT - Double Stitched Diamond Seams Provide luxury look and embossed, cushioned feel. High-density foam padding offers maximum comfort during long drives and daily commutes.
NON-SLIP AND SECURE - Small rubber grips on the back prevent sliding while elastic straps securely anchor the seat covers in place.
CONVENIENT STORAGE - Built-in pockets with stitched dividers keep your cell phone, wallet and other items organized and easily within reach.
FITS MOST VEHICLES - Universal sizing of 21” x 19. 5” works in nearly any vehicle. See product photos for examples of compatible vehicles.
body.description: These premium padded seat covers provide comfort and protection for your vehicle's seats. Made of soft yet durable microfiber leather and high-density foam, they keep you comfortable during long drives while shielding the seats from wear and tear. With a non-slip backing and elastic straps, the covers stay securely in place without shifting around. Built-in pockets organize your essential items like phones, wallets and more while keeping them within easy reach. Designed to fit most vehicles, these stylish covers are a great interior upgrade for car and truck owners alike.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Motor Trend Universal Car Front Seat Cushions Premium Faux Leather with Storage Pockets Our Motor Trend Universal Car Front Seat Cushions provides valuable protection and luxurious comfort for nearly any car or truck. Non-slip features including anchors and hooks help to ensure a tight fit with minimal movement once installed. High-Quality Materials Breathable Microfiber Leather provides cozy yet durable protection for your vehicle's upholstery. Our seat cover protects against everyday wear and tear for your car or truck.. Details Protects your seats against spills and stains. Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort. Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior. Easy to Install within minutes.

Convenient Front Pockets Easily store your cellphone, wallet and more using the built-in front pocket! The stitched divider helps to keep your goods organized. Conveniently add some extra storage and protection to your car using these seat covers Padded For Comfort Unlike other seat cushions for cars, we made sure that comfort was a priority for our products. The entire seat mat is lined with a high-density foam to provide maximum comfort and relief during long trips and daily commutes. Universal Fit Design You won’t have to worry about fixing or reinstalling these seat cushions every time you drive your car. The backside is coated with small rubber nibs to prevent any movement when in use. Anchors attached to elastic straps also provide secure reinforcement.
Made for Auto Enthusiasts Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the middle seat
reviews.reviewText: I have nice faux leather seat covers but I needed something for the middle seat in my Dodge Ram truck.I take my dog everywhere but the hair issue is horrible and I needed some way to keep the hair off the middle seat and keep my truck looking nice. This did the trick!!! It’s easy to wipe off with a damp cloth and it looks great!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were very clear and complete. The color works for the interior of our 2017 Sonata. The fit is great. The pockets are nice but small, good for credit cards, ID cards,gift cards etc. The seat cushion is thick and comfortable and easy to clean. Not to complain but a little expensive but still good quality .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The seat covers have a very great fit and our comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They're ok, not impressed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Tried these in a 2016 Toyota Sequoia that has a gray interior and the seat is to wide for this cover. You cannot put the side flaps over the sides and have it sit flush. They also slide around on the leather seats. Also the leather of the cover starts wearing pretty quickly. Was hoping for a better fit and product.Update, also just tried on in a 2000 Chevy Silverado and it's also not as wide as the seat. You won't be able to put the side flaps down. You can leave the side flaps tucked up and under and it will sit there, bit still not protecting the whole seat. If it fit I was going to look into the tan/brown ones for my truck.I would only recommend using these in small SUV's, crossovers, and mid size to compact cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These Do NOT Fit 2004 Freestar Ltd 4.2 Although They Were Guaranteed to Fit
reviews.reviewText: These were guaranteed to fit my vehicle and they DO NOT. My seats contain a hard plastic wall between the seat and floor, non removable, with no spaces; so the elastic cord on the front of the seat cushion that goes beneath the seat can NOT go beneath the seat. My seats have a flipper lever mechanism on the side, which you use when you want to incline or fold the back of the seat, forward. The cushion's sides do not fit in the limited space between the flipper and the seat; you cannot press the side of the seat cushion material into the available space as you are supposed to do, the cushion material is too thick to fit no matter how hard you try. So the cushion is entirely wrong for my vehicle, 100% wrong. I really do not appreciate this hassle. Do your homework, Motor Trend, have some professional pride in getting it right. It's a lie that it fits; in no way even comes close to fitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Given some of the reviews I was a bit concerned when we ordered but for the price we thought, lets try it out. They fit the seats perfectly and look nice, not glaringly obvious and seem good quality thus far. Great value I would say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leather look cover. Not flimsy. Easy to put on. Stays in place while going in and out of car. Looks great.
